item.title: Paolo's sauce
item.description: Notes My mom always added butter at the end to give it a more velvety taste. I haven’t done it but it’s an option Ingredients 1 large onion chopped and sautéed until translucent Olive oil (quello buono) 1 Large can of crushed tomatoes 1 Pomì of strained tomatoes Salt, pepper to taste Rosemary (fresh if possible) Directions Cover the bottom of the pan with oil on medium heat When oil is beginning to sizzle add the onion and rosemary.

item.title: Sugo di Carne
item.description: Ingredients 4T. Olive oil 2 cloves of garlic 1lb. Beef chuck short ribs- boneless 1lb. Pork shoulder country style ribs-boneless 1 28oz. Tomato purée 2T. Tomato paste 1T. Salt 1t. Pepper 2 sprigs rosemary Directions Brown garlic in the oil and remove when golden Add the meat and sauté until nicely browned Add all other ingredients and bring to a boil Turn to simmer and cook for at least 2 hrs.

item.title: Wild Mushroom Ragu
item.description: WILD MUSHROOM RAGÙ Ingredients 1/3 C. Olive oil 4 C. Mixed mushrooms Salt, pepper 2 cloves minced garlic 1 minced shallot 1 t. Rosemary 1 t. Oregano 1/2 c. Tomato sauce 1/4 c. Red wine 1/2 c. Veggie broth 1 T. Butter Chopped fresh parsley Directions Serve over polenta
